|   | Protects the caster from all kinds of projectile attacks, making them significantly easier to dodge. It is highly effective against both single-target and penetrating attacks. Each time a missile is deflected the spell has a chance of expiring, with a lower chance of expiry at high power. |

**Deflect Missiles** is a level 6 [Air](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")/[Charms](/Charms "Charms") spell which strongly protects the caster from ranged attacks.

## Contents

- [1 Effect](#Effect)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [4 History](#History)
- [5 References](#References)

## Effect

Once cast, deflecting missiles (DMsl) status is gained. This status will not time out, instead on each successful deflection there is a 8/(2 + power) chance of losing the status. The status can also be dispelled by magic-dispelling effects (like [potion of cancellation](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") or [Quicksilver Bolt](/Quicksilver_Bolt "Quicksilver Bolt")) or forgetting the spell.

While active, Deflect Missiles reduces the [to-hit](/To-hit "To-hit") of ranged attacks against the caster to a random value between:

- vs single-target beams: 0% - 50% of its normal value
- vs penetrating bolts: 0% - 66% of its normal value[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

This spell only helps you to [evade](/Ev "Ev") ranged attacks; it has no effect on your ability to [block](/SH "SH") them.

Deflect Missiles is a more advanced version of the Repel Missiles effect of [repulsion](/Repulsion "Repulsion") and its effect overrides that of RMsl.

## Strategy

This spell gives a very good amount of protection, but there are still a few ranged attacks than can ignore it, among them such nasty things as [Hellfire](/Hellfire "Hellfire"), [Torment](/Torment "Torment"), and [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), as well as all [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes"). Even so, it can be very useful in places like the last level of [the Shoals](/The_Shoals "The Shoals") ([merfolk javelineers](/Merfolk_javelineer "Merfolk javelineer")), the last level of the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls") ([deep elf master archers](/Deep_elf_master_archer "Deep elf master archer")), or [Zot](/Zot "Zot") ([electric golems](/Electric_golem "Electric golem"), [ancient liches](/Ancient_lich "Ancient lich")).

Despite its power, this spell's usefulness is very character-dependent. In general, it doesn't do much that good [EV](/EV "EV") *or* [AC](/AC "AC") won't do. Usually, the characters who will find this the most useful are the purest of casters: it is possible for a low-HP [deep elf](/Deep_elf "Deep elf") to conquer [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot") with 8 AC and 16 EV if they make very judicious use of this and other utility spells.

Given that it is not usually necessary to cast this spell in combat, it is perfectly fine to have this spell at a high failure chance, take your armour and shield off and put on various items of wizardry in order to cast it. It is unlikely that any of even the most severe [miscast effects](/Miscast_effect "Miscast effect") can have a marked effect if you cast this spell in a completely safe location (eg. a cleared floor). Doing this may significantly reduce the amount of skill required to cast it.

## Monster Version

The monster version of the spell functions much like the player version, but monsters generate with the spell already active.

The following enemies cast Deflect Missiles:

- k [![Wind drake.png](/images/b/b7/Wind_drake.png)](/File:Wind_drake.png) **[wind drake](/Wind_drake "Wind drake")**
- i [![Spriggan air mage.png](/images/c/cd/Spriggan_air_mage.png)](/File:Spriggan_air_mage.png) **[spriggan air mage](/Spriggan_air_mage "Spriggan air mage")**
- i [![The Enchantress.png](/images/8/8f/The_Enchantress.png)](/File:The_Enchantress.png) **[the Enchantress](/The_Enchantress "The Enchantress")**
- Q [![Sojobo.png](/images/6/66/Sojobo.png)](/File:Sojobo.png) **[Sojobo](/Sojobo "Sojobo")**

## History

- Deflect Missiles was removed in [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"). Monsters that could cast this spell got [Repel Missiles](/Repel_Missiles "Repel Missiles") and +2 [EV](/EV "EV") instead.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), deflecting missiles status expired based on a timer.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [beam.cc:2823](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.24.0/crawl-ref/source/beam.cc#L2823) (0.24.0)
